price: Қилиб ўтган яхши амалларингиз учун енглар, ичинглар. Ош бўлсин.
arabic: كُلُواْ وَٱشۡرَبُواْ هَنِيٓـَٔۢا بِمَا كُنتُمۡ تَعۡمَلُونَ

version.title: Uzbek Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Uzbek by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: kulū wa-ish'rabū hanīan bimā kuntum taʿmalūna
